title: Mini-Ep 52: Cuticle Care 101
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 52: Cuticle Care 101
itunes:subtitle: Doree and Kate receive several replies about cuticle care, hear from Switzerland correspondent Amy regarding the pronunciation of “micellar,” give tips to a listener planning her 40th birthday celebration, and hear from someone figuring out her self-ca...
description:
Doree and Kate receive several replies about cuticle care, hear from Switzerland correspondent Amy regarding the pronunciation of “micellar,” give tips to a listener planning her 40th birthday celebration, and hear from someone figuring out her self-care needs after a divorce and breast cancer treatment.

To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

This episode is sponsored by:

  • Living Proof - Get a free sample of their dry shampoo with your purchase. Just visit livingproof.com/forever35 and use promo code forever35.
  • Molekule - To receive $75 off your first order, visit molekule.com and enter forever75 at checkout.
  • Talkspace - Go to talkspace.com and use promo code forever35 to get $45 off your first month.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
